column4: instead of proftpd, pureftpd has multiple GUI's and for me, its a much powerfull and secure than proftpd (http://www.debianhelp.co.uk/pureftpweb.htm)
yep I am well aware of proftpd vs pureftpd :)  I actually maintain some of the proftpd code :)
albeit I run it primarily on FreeBSD. My Linux boxes use pureftpd.
